channel.title: How do I fix the npc's?
channel.description: When I attack a npc there hp doesn't drain how do I fix that? And while I attack I get this error look behind client [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/149oakm.jpg[/img] Does anyone know how to fix?

item.title: How do I fix the npc's?
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:4, topic:440603”][quote author=ezzi link=topic=543282.msg3981766#msg3981766 date=1335368457]
But it only happens on this client I can use another, and it’s fine.
[/quote]

You just answered your own question.[/quote]
Lol true… I’m still going to try and fix it

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix the npc's?

item.title: How do I fix the npc's?
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

Good Idea… I should just delete it all, But it only happens on this client I can use another, and it’s fine.[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:2, topic:440603”]go to your server folder. Press ctrl+A then press delete, then enter… voila fixed.

but seriously, i’m guessing youve messed the method that checks from the server how much damage is dealt or maybe the method that shows hitmarks. i’m not a client wizz but seems to be something like that[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix the npc's?

item.title: How do I fix the npc's?
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

go to your server folder. Press ctrl+A then press delete, then enter… voila fixed.

but seriously, i’m guessing youve messed the method that checks from the server how much damage is dealt or maybe the method that shows hitmarks. i’m not a client wizz but seems to be something like that

Read full topic
